trans-unit.source: The UCI Statlog (German Credit Card) dataset (<html></html>Statlog+German+Credit+Data<html></html>), using the german.data file.<html></html> <html></html>The dataset classifies people, described by a set of attributes, as low or high credit risks.
trans-unit.target: The UCI Statlog (German Credit Card) dataset (<html></html>Statlog+German+Credit+Data<html></html>), using the german.data file.<html></html> <html></html>The dataset classifies people, described by a set of attributes, as low or high credit risks.

trans-unit.source: There are 20 features, both numerical and categorical, and a binary label (the credit risk value).
trans-unit.target: There are 20 features, both numerical and categorical, and a binary label (the credit risk value).

trans-unit.source: High credit risk entries have label = 2, low credit risk entries have label = 1.
trans-unit.target: High credit risk entries have label = 2, low credit risk entries have label = 1.

trans-unit.source: The cost of misclassifying a low risk example as high is 1, whereas the cost of misclassifying a high risk example as low is 5.
trans-unit.target: The cost of misclassifying a low risk example as high is 1, whereas the cost of misclassifying a high risk example as low is 5.
